item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Ryanz, post:3, topic:252540”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=333527.msg2598804#msg2598804 date=1230119492]
javac HelloWorld.java
[/quote]Need the compiler code.[/quote]
javac HelloWorld.java compiles the code
java HelloWorld runs the code (or it could be java HelloWorld.class, can’t remember didn’t do this in a while and it was only brief).

If that doesn’t work and gives errors you need to change your environmental variables.

item.title: Hello
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

Ok this sound like a noob but i don’t really care i just want to learn java not Runescape related

ok so i have this code:

class HelloWorld { public static void main (String args[]) { System.out.println(“Hello World!”); } }

Everyone knows that ok if i make a new folder called “Java Skills” or whatever and put this code in my file saved as HelloWorld.java and then if i compile this does it save as HelloWorld.class also i need to have a compiler for this if anyone can give me the compiler code to “compile” these files.

Much appreciated.

Read full topic
